name: CL_LQH
description: This table contains all records extracted from the LQH master file (Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition). See CL_LQH_1 for additional columns.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique id of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record. This column is frequently used to link to the SOCIAL_ADL_HX  table.

columns.name: RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Visit Navigator (VN) History Template Definition (LQH) record.
